t:
When I signed up for the new drug trial, I didn't expect things to go haywire.
After a week of nightmarish hallucinations with strange creatures, I requested the researchers that I wanted out.


They were surprised and told me that I was actually in the placebo group.
c:
‘Placebos look like the real medical treatment that is being studied except they do not contain the active medication.’



#drug #test #participate #hallucination #nightmare #helpless #placebo #unusual
